ItemHolder.Name: TreasureHunt
ItemHolder.SerializedCanvas: {"version":2.92,"type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.QuestTree","translation":{"x":-2946.0,"y":-3271.0},"zoomFactor":0.7135515,"nodes":[{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"statement":{"_text":"Heloise Arago is an historian, a wise women able to commune with the memories of our ancestors. She will stay in Cierzo for a few days. I wonder what she is looking for in the Chersonese."},"logParameters":[],"$type":"NodeCanvas.Tasks.Actions.QuestAction_AddLogEntry"}]},"_position":{"x":5442.086,"y":5177.944},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.ActionState","$id":"2"},{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"m_objectivesToComplete":[{"QuestEventRef":{"m_eventUID":"1t8Be0ajj0imKUbFgJ1r8Q"},"saveCompletion":{},"m_objective":{"UID":"e552c6c3344b460db7cef1e8382404be","$type":"QuestSystem.QuestObjectives.EventOccured"},"$type":"QuestSystem.NodeObjectives.QuestAction_QuestEventOccured","$id":"12"},{"saveCompletion":{},"m_objective":{"ExpiredTime":264,"UID":"ca1e3b2e9f084652b435cf3543563859","$type":"QuestSystem.QuestObjectives.WaitGameTime"},"$type":"QuestSystem.NodeObjectives.QuestAction_WaitGameTime","$id":"16"}],"m_questBranchPerObjective":[1,2],"m_objectiveIndexPerBranchValue":[0,1],"ParentActionList":{"$ref":"8"},"saveCompletion":{},"m_objective":{"UID":"ec7bd68b5db94d1a856b7b8ea18b2fd8","$type":"QuestSystem.QuestObjectives.QuestBranchingPoint"},"$type":"QuestSystem.NodeObjectives.QuestAction_QuestBranchingPoint"},{"$ref":"12"},{"$ref":"16"}],"$id":"8"},"_position":{"x":5796.997,"y":5239.52},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.QuestStep","$id":"7"},{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"statement":{"_text":"She is racing against some unkown opponents on her quest to retrieve informations. It seems she's on a treasure hunt."},"logParameters":[],"$type":"NodeCanvas.Tasks.Actions.QuestAction_AddLogEntry"}]},"_position":{"x":6353.456,"y":5105.203},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.QuestStep","$id":"23"},{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"statement":{"_text":"I managed to gain some trust from the historian. She asked me to provide discretly three doses of Blue Sand. It is against the law, our tribe is under an agreement with the Sorobor Academy for the sale of this precious sand."},"logParameters":[],"$type":"NodeCanvas.Tasks.Actions.QuestAction_AddLogEntry"}]},"_position":{"x":7233.547,"y":4802.554},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.QuestStep","$id":"28"},{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"statement":{"_text":"I gathered enouh Blue Sand for Heloise and I was richly rewarded. Now that we are partners she is ready to trust me. The sand was needed to create some kind of map."},"logParameters":[],"$type":"NodeCanvas.Tasks.Actions.QuestAction_AddLogEntry"}]},"_position":{"x":7813.52,"y":4864.104},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.QuestStep","$id":"33"},{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"statement":{"_text":"I need to commune on the altar of my fallen tribesman, erected near the Vigil. The map created with the Blue Sand will gain the imprint of my ancestors memories."},"logParameters":[],"$type":"NodeCanvas.Tasks.Actions.QuestAction_AddLogEntry"}]},"_position":{"x":8329.616,"y":4868.527},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.QuestStep","$id":"38"},{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"statement":{"_text":"The ancestors guides me toward the spear of the Sea Weaver, our holiest relic! It is displayed day and night upon the throne of our Chamberlady, always under close guard."},"logParameters":[],"$type":"NodeCanvas.Tasks.Actions.QuestAction_AddLogEntry"}]},"_position":{"x":8928.71,"y":4882.112},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.QuestStep","$id":"43"},{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"statement":{"_text":"The spear itself was used to hide one fragment of the treasure. Ttwo other parts were sewned into a cape and a painting, both located into an old shipwreck. I must seek a vessel half sunk and half buried somewhere within the eyesight from the Vigil."},"logParameters":[],"$type":"NodeCanvas.Tasks.Actions.QuestAction_AddLogEntry"}]},"_position":{"x":9530.77,"y":4944.819},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.QuestStep","$id":"48"},{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"statement":{"_text":"I have now the treasure! It is the old banner of the tribe of Levant. This tribal territory is currently a contested battleground."},"logParameters":[],"$type":"NodeCanvas.Tasks.Actions.QuestAction_AddLogEntry"}]},"_position":{"x":10150.17,"y":4968.636},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.QuestStep","$id":"53"},{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"isSuccessful":{"_value":true},"$type":"NodeCanvas.Tasks.Actions.CompleteQuest"}]},"_position":{"x":10714.21,"y":5018.383},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.QuestStep","$id":"58"},{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"QuestEventRef":{"m_eventUID":"7gmvxn52E0icGBsw9eI1XQ"},"$type":"NodeCanvas.Tasks.Actions.SendQuestEvent"}]},"_position":{"x":6348.408,"y":5423.235},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.QuestStep","$id":"63"},{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"statement":{"_text":"Heloise and her mercenaries have departed from Cierzo before I could learn anything of note about their quest."},"logParameters":[],"$type":"NodeCanvas.Tasks.Actions.QuestAction_AddLogEntry"}]},"_position":{"x":6677.82,"y":5449.826},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.QuestStep","$id":"68"},{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"isSuccessful":{},"$type":"NodeCanvas.Tasks.Actions.CompleteQuest"}]},"_position":{"x":7137.9,"y":5516.379},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.QuestStep","$id":"73"},{"_position":{"x":6816.672,"y":5713.182},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.AnyState","$id":"78"},{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"statement":{"_text":"The Chamberlady has decided to banish the historian from Cierzo. A harsh but logic move. I don't know what is going to happen now."},"logParameters":[],"$type":"NodeCanvas.Tasks.Actions.QuestAction_AddLogEntry"}]},"_position":{"x":7292.885,"y":5717.556},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.QuestStep","$id":"79"},{"_position":{"x":5374.869,"y":4917.75},"$type":"NodeCanvas.StateMachines.AnyState","$id":"84"},{"_actionList":{"executionMode":"ActionsRunInParallel","actions":[{"statement":{"_text":"I
